__e: "The heart is the only muscle in the body "that can be broken by a harsh word--"
Sometimes I think your heart muscle is bigger than people give you credit for.
There was this guy that could turn into anyone at all... flexing some muscles in his face.
Looks like you're the muscles and the brains, huh?
Well, I mean, it's kinda true. How else does Rob Pattinson have a career?
Students, the lesson that I want to teach you today is the relationship between muscle and strength.
